name: Zerograve
description:
Zerograve is a six degrees of freedom (6DOF) first person shooter in zero gravity. Awakened with your mind trapped inside a combat drone, the path forward goes through an army of hostile robots in neon-lit mazes.

Navigate through vertical 3D levels using a sonar map which aids in finding paths through walls. Careful exploration is rewarded, as secret rooms provide shields, ammunition and other resources in times of need.

Unlock new weapons to deal with any situation: obliterate groups of enemies with plasma bombs, burst nearby bots with laser shotgun, hunt with homing missiles and more.
